text: On Ze Boulevard is a 1927 American comedy silent film directed by Harry F. Millarde and written by Earl Baldwin, William Scott Darling, Joseph Farnham and Richard Schayer. The film stars Lew Cody, Renée Adorée, Anton Vaverka, Dorothy Sebastian and Roy D'Arcy. The film was released on June 25, 1927, by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Cast == *Lew Cody as Gaston Pasqual *Renée Adorée as Musette *Anton Vaverka as Ribot *Dorothy Sebastian as Gaby de Sylva *Roy D'Arcy as Counnt de Guissac == References == == External links == * Category:1927 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1927 comedy films Category:Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American silent feature films
title: On Ze Boulevard
